favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

colors_accent_1.label: Accent 1
colors_accent_1.info: Main accent color (secondary button text and border, header accent, etc).

colors_text.label: Text
colors_text.info: Used as foreground color on background colors.

cookie_banner_enabled.label: Show cookie banner
cookie_banner_enabled.info: * make sure the option "Collected after consent" is selected. [Online Store > Preferences > Customer Privacy](https://admin.shopify.com/online_store/preferences)

cookie_banner_link_to_privacy_page_enabl.label: Show link to the cookie privacy page

privacy_page_url.label: Select page
privacy_page_url.info: Bind a page that inform users about how your company engages in data tracking and online privacy

product_card_rating.label: Show rating
product_card_rating.info: Requires [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app. Otherwise, it has no affect.

product_card_rating_judgeme.label: Show rating (Judge.me)
product_card_rating_judgeme.info: Requires [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/judgeme) app from Judge.me. Otherwise, it has no affect.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

bold_first_heading_word.label: Enable heading style
bold_first_heading_word.info: If the option is disabled, all headings are shown as bold.

settings.notice: Some theme languages don't support predictive search. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/ajax/reference/predictive-search#supported-languages)

predictive_search_min_query_length.label: Minimal query length
predictive_search_min_query_length.info: * Implies the number of characters typed in the search bar.

minicart_link_to_cart.label: Show the link to the cart

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.has_cards_info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

show_secondary_image.label: Show the second image on hover

promote_random.label: Enable "random" products when there is nothing to promote

promote_source.label: Products to promote
promote_source.info: We recommend using the product metafield as a source of items to promote. The metafield must have the content type "Product - List of products".

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

color_scheme.info: Select image padding to make color visible.

second_image.label: Show the second image on hover

video_url.label: Link
video_url.info: Videos play in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo link

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

header.info: * - required fields. With empty coordinates, the default place will be shown.

show_search_field.label: Show search field
show_search_field.info: Can be useful to find a question quikly

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: The definition names - "faqs", "faqs_1", "faqs_2"; Create a metafields data type "JSON" [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields/using-metafields)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: * In case using any Shopify apps to display custom assets, be sure that the apps are installed.

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For better results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

show_random.label: Show "random" products when collection not set or empty

products_per_row.info: It has affect when products presented as grid.
products_per_row.label: Products per row

products_appearance.info: Option "Mixed" presents products as grid on desktop and slider on mobile
products_appearance.label: Appearance

show_slider_buttons.label: Show slider navigations
show_slider_buttons.info: Available for the tablet and mobie screen

show_random.label: Show "random" products when product list is empty

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/sections#featured-product-rating)

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: A heading is required to display the menu.

full_width.label: Show the footer section in full width

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

show_policy.label: Show policy
show_policy.info: The policies must be created or customized in your [Shopify Policy settings](/admin/settings/legal)

follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow On Shop
follow_on_shop.info: Display Follow button for your storefront [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

full_width.label: Show the header top section in full width

add_border_bottom.label: Show the border at the bottom

full_width.label: Show the header section in full width

megamenu_items.label: Megamenu items name
megamenu_items.info: * Comma separator. To show dropdown content for an item that does not have submenu, type its name and add a Header block.

collection_icon.label: Select icon
collection_icon.info: * Use the same icon for each collection menu item

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: The header is shown on the screen when customers scroll up.

add_border_bottom.label: Show the border at the bottom

add_border_searchfield.label: Show border for a search field

second_dropdown_limit_qty_categories.label: Limit the number of categories to show.
second_dropdown_limit_qty_categories.info: Allows to limit second dropdown level menu with type "Megamenu".

show_switcher_currency.label: Show currency selector
show_switcher_currency.info: Make sure your store sells in multiple currencies

show_switcher_language.label: Show language selector
show_switcher_language.info: Available when the store has at least two published languages

item_menu_index.label: Index of parent-item menu. (Top level menu)
item_menu_index.info: Only one image item per parent item is available

disable_menu_links.label: Remove menu links
disable_menu_links.info: You can remove menu items and show the Image banner or Collection list in the dropdown.

is_preload.label: Preload images
is_preload.info: It can improve page rendering time and Google performance score when the image banner is above the fold content.

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

list_articles.label: Posts to recommend
list_articles.info: Handles of posts you want to recommend. Separate handles with `|` (vertical line). We suggest to use metafield here.

show_latest.label: Show latest posts when "Posts to recommend" is empty

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For better results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio.

show_filter_articles.label: Use blogs filter
show_filter_articles.info: Add tags to your blog posts to organize them by category or subject and filter them.

paragraph.content: Decorate newest article as lead article

qty_words_to_show.label: Truncate the number of words (Strip HTML tags.)
qty_words_to_show.info: "0" or empty will show the full collection description.

hide_images_on_mobile.label: Hide collection images on mobile
hide_images_on_mobile.info: Available for Image ratio: Adapt to image and Portrait. (Can be useful for better mobile performance)

settings.subtitle: Add and update your store filters in Shopify admin.

image.info: Use collection featured image when nothing selected
image.label: Image

columns.label: Columns
columns.info: The option has effect only when the mode "Grid" is enabled.

show_badges.label: Show product badges in the gallery

is_thumbnail_mobile_bullet.label: Enable simple bullets for thumbnails on mobile

show_price.label: Show price on desktop
show_price.info: Screens 990px and wider. When enabled this option hides the sibling block "Pricing and Installments" on the desktop.

show_rating_judgeme.label: Show rating (Judge.me)
show_rating_judgeme.info: Requires [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/judgeme) app from Judge.me. Otherwise, it has no affect. No rating badge is hidden. Check app settings to show it.

settings.notice: The block can be not visible if sibling "Title" has the option "Show badges on desktop" enabled

stock_left_threshold.label: Stock quantity threshold
stock_left_threshold.info: Threshold to show inventory quantity left.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available in your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

gift_card_show_recipient_form.label: Show recipient information form
gift_card_show_recipient_form.info: Gift card products can be sent directly to the recipient with a message.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

enable_sticky_gallery.label: Enable sticky gallery on large screens

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky information on large screens

paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

page.label: Page
page.info: The contact form will not appear if a contact page is selected!

details_in_list.label: Show product details in the list

details_in_row.label: Show product details in a row

heading.label: Title
heading.info: We recommend using metafields as a source of FAQs. The metafield must have the name "faq" and content type "Json". {"Question?": "Answer."} [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/metafields/displaying-metafields-on-your-online-store)

default_faqs.label: Example of FAQ
default_faqs.info: This is an example to show FAQ on the product page. Use metafields settings to create FAQs.

reviews.name: Reviews
reviews.paragraph: We integrated reviews widget from different apps here. Chosen app must be installed. You have to save the settings to see reviews widget.

enable_theme_appearance.label: Enable theme-powered appearance
enable_theme_appearance.info: Some color, font-size settings set in the app may be overridden when theme appearance enabled.

product_list.label: Select products
product_list.info: Manually select complementary products with no parent products links. The products must be In stock.

use_search_and_discovery_app.label: Show products using the Shopify app
use_search_and_discovery_app.info: Use Shopify Search & Discovery app to control the complementary products. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery)

decorate.label: Decorate with design elements
decorate.info: Make sure theme design elements enable in theme settings.

slider_preload_first.label: Preload first slide
slider_preload_first.info: It can improve page rendering time and Google performance score when the slideshow is above the fold content.

page.label: Page with testimonials
page.info: Page has to have metafield "testimonials" with content type JSON. [Learn more](https://shopify.swissuplabs.com/hc/en-us/articles/16349993257373-Edit-testimonials-page)

fallback_data.label: Custom testimonials
fallback_data.info: JSON array of testimonials. When page with testimonials isn't selected.

show_all.label: Show all testimonials
show_all.info: Overrides option above when it is enabled.

appearance.label: Appearance
appearance.info: Option "Mixed" presents testimonials as grid on desktop and slider on mobile

show_photo.label: Show person's photo
show_photo.info: Uplaod photo to "Files". Use key `photo` in JSON array item and set uploaded file name for it.

show_date.label: Show date
show_date.info: Use key `date` in JSON array item to set the date.

show_rating.label: Show rating
show_rating.info: Use key `rating` in JSON array item to set the rating.

field_order.label: Field "Order"
field_order.info: You can use this field instead of email to verify customer

visibility.label: Visible
visibility.info: The mobile screen has a width of up to 768px. Other screens are desktop size.
